She won the Protector Cersivey's favor by her strength, and was appointed as the vice captain of the Order.

1300990.text:
She always charges in front, and has slain countless enemies on the battlefield so she is hailed as the Crimson Maiden of War by other chevaliers... 

It's said that she kind of enjoys this title but for her foes, hearing this title on the battlefield means the arrival of a bloody end.

1300991.text:
Sent by the Protector on a special mission, 

she seems to have encountered some accident. No one has seen her since her departure.

1300997.text: Elis, like the rest of her clan who grew up in the forest, lived in symbiosis with the animals, and learned the necessary skills to hunt.

1300998.text:
Elis is a born warrior. The wild power entwined in her genes soon made her stand out as the best hunter in the clan. Later, she was elected chief. 

Even feral beasts do not dare to behave in front of her. 

Even a fierce tiger becomes as docile as a pet while receiving a simple glare from her.

1300999.text:
Elis firmly believes in the law of the jungle, but unlike the rest of the clan, she doesn't try to exterminate all the intruders of the forest. 

Perhaps, to the Queen of the Forest, those invaders are just a group of nonentities.

1301000.text:
She used to live in the forest with her clan. However, to protect the forest from the outsiders, Elis and her clan chose to pledge their loyalty to the Protector. 

As a result, no one dares to invade the forest.

1301002.text: Cute dresses, flowers, and sharp objects

1301003.text: Traveling, stargazing, exotic cuisine, and poems

1301007.text: Making dolls and getting fawned over

1301010.text:
As the present ruler of the River of the Underworld, she cares greatly about her status as the Fallen Angel and the mention of it can enrage her. She's moody and unpredictable.

The ghosts of the underworld are often severely punished for offending her with even a small trifle.

1301011.text:
She speaks a patrician language that is close to extinction. 

No one understands it except for herself and some deliverers. 

It seems she doesn't care about her unintelligible way of speaking, but rather sees it as a sign of her own nobility.

1301012.text:
She likes singing by the River of the Underworld. 

It is said that all the ghosts will gather and bow down before her, and she will condescend to sing in an intelligible language for those she sees as inferiors. 

It is said that her only friend is Sher, the Wanderer of Fate. 
Acheronte admits that Sher is the only one willing to hear her singing. 

And Acheronte once said Sher is not a real name, 
she is far nobler than Acheronte herself. 
Yet it is still quite confusing for other people to figure out 
what sort of being could be even nobler than Acheronte the present ruler.

1301013.text:
She will use honorifics only when referring to Sher. 

Otherwise, she always uses unintelligible words when speaking to others. 

"O fragile beings, beest grateful to mine own chanting f'r thee." 

"Thee crosseth the Lethe and stayeth in hell to atone f'r thy sins. This is thy only choice."

1301015.text: Magic practice, plain and simple things, and cuisine

1301019.text:
She is the leader of the many deliverers at the entrance to the Underworld, but she is often not given the respect she deserves. 

Her main duty is to command her underlings to deliver wandering souls to the next life. 

If there are any defiled spirits nearby, she will use her giant scythe to destroy them without mercy.

1301020.text:
A careless girl with a serious look on her face, 

she is not active in her work, often gets distracted and slacks off. Fortunately, her companions can always complete the work dutifully. 

Goorveig, in particular, does not like her lazy attitude and would often criticize her. However, Kyphon does not mind it at all.

1301021.text:
A deliverer's duty is to guide ghosts to the next life, and prevent them from hurting the living. 

Goorveig, her former companion, violated the duty and reaped the souls of the living. In order to hunt her down, Kyphon stepped into the Chrono Tower.

1301022.text:
She is often reported by fellow deliverers for being lazy. But the Acheronte, the ruler of Underworld doesn't punish her for that, and Kyphon herself has no willing to make a change. 

Sometimes, she can be found lying by the River of the Underworld and resting like there's no one around. 

Goorveig once made a detector that could wake up Kyphon as soon as it found her sleeping. But after Goorveig left there, Kyphon is back to lazy mode again.

"Oh? A new soul? Ah, never mind. I'll leave it to the others."

1301023.text: Treating the injured, sewing, and gardening

1301024.text:
This wallflower-like girl wields a huge wand that is completely at odds with her petite frame. 

She not only is proficient in common healing magic, but also can use the forbidden magic that's only known by Night Clan. She can cure wounds that are seemingly incurable for others. 

However, when pressed, Tuonel always avoids talking about this with a stammer.

1301025.text:
Tuonel was the black sheep of her family. 

Her mother, the youngest daughter of the most powerful family in Chilora, accidentally saved a fallen angel that was wounded. 

She fell in love with him and gave birth to an illegitimate child – Tuonel. 

Her family disowned her and drove her out of the house.

1301026.text:
This little abandoned girl wandered alone until she was accepted by the Fallen Angels and eventually integrated into the Night Clan. 

Unlike the rest of the clansmen, this descendant of a fallen angel never uses the life-siphoning magic. 

She heals all those injured equally, whether human or not, while others look on in amazement.

1301027.text:
She was reluctant to talk about her early childhood in Chilora or to reveal why she came to Cassiel, but the villagers kindly accepted her. 

As an apothecary, she enthusiastically helped the villagers and gradually integrated into their daily life. Tuonel eagers for a friend, and Nemesi is always the top one on her willing-to-be-friend list.

1301029.text:
Yothaya, this Fomoire-born girl from the west who inherits the bloodline of the Siam family, 

is the master of the "Corrag (Finger)" among the Six Ovates.

1301030.text: Unlike other Ovate families, the Siam family gave up the pursuit of greater power. They only wish to use the healing magic at their fingertips to relieve the suffering of their people.

1301031.text:
The good-natured Yothaya never gets into conflicts with others, nor even interacts much with them. 

Her only friends are Yui and Miku, and she always wants to dress as cute as they do. 

Her petite figure seems to fit into the cute clothing style.

1301032.text:
At her age, the flowers, plants, insects, and butterflies in the fields are far more attractive than the complicated and tedious rituals. 

Therefore, she often skips her imposed rituals to go play in the forest. 

She recently developed a strong interest in cooking and made a lot of strange dishes. And she asked Miku to have a taste of them. 

Miku did not like those dishes, but still struggled to finish them. That gave Yothaya the wrong impression that her cooking skill has improved a lot. 

Now she is thinking about giving those confident dishes to Norn the Ovate, and Miku is trying to stop her from doing that.

1301034.text: The young girl who only appears by the sea looks no different from human. $B$$B$She often strolls on the beach before the low tide and picks up shells as gifts for others.

1301035.text: Ardisia was adopted by the Sea Elf in her childhood. $B$Her adoptive mother taught her how to breathe underwater. The ocean is her home. $B$$B$Far away from the humans, Ardisia knows nothing about the dangers of the outside world.

1301036.text: As long as the weather is clear, $B$$B$Ardisia will definitely come to the beach for a walk. $B$As the sun sets and the sky darkens, she will make a silent maiden's wish to the shooting stars.

1301037.text: It is said that her adoptive mother, $B$$B$the Sea Elf, hates humans so much $B$that when a boy attempts to approach Ardisia, $B$the calm ocean will churn, as if to engulf the frivolous boy.

1301039.text: He was the gatekeeper of the Sanctuary and the older brother of Afallen and Parfait. $B$$B$However, he is not interested in his work at all, but absorbs himself in composing music.

1301040.text: Although not interested in his work, he is somehow trusted by the Protector. $B$$B$One day, $B$Garditis left the Sanctuary because there was a lack of creative inspiration. $B$$B$According to his own words, $B$his best piece was finished by the Elf Lakeside.

1301041.text: Garditis became a bard in the Lower Domain, playing his favorite melodies for all to hear. $B$$B$ Unlike other noble sorcerers of the Upper Domain, $B$Garditis had a very good relationship with the inhabitants of the Lower Domain and even invited them to perform with him.

1301042.text: Someone had seen him several times in the Forest of Elves, $B$but he only wandered at the entrance to the forest and did not step in, $B$as if an invisible wall existed. $B$$B$Turns out, Mayahuel seems to dislike Garditis a lot, $B$and would scold and throw him out whenever she sees him approaching the Forest of Elves.

1301044.text:
The princess of the Sunrise Island in the far east.

Her mother is the queen that rules over this land.

You can find the elegancy from her every move.

1301045.text: Regarded as the successor of the Living God, she has been receiving an elite education from a young age. Study politics, etiquette, and various conjuring.

1301046.text:
Every year, she offers a dance at the Kami Festival. Spectators marvel at the softness and elegance of her dance "Seigaiha." 

It is said only the true successor can learn it. 

The dance is like the ripples of a vast ocean. God's grace is omnipresent and boundless, 

and as a successor, Talhae will combine the people's prayers for peace and blessings for the future into the dance, and offer it to the God who blesses the land

1301047.text:
Although she is the enviable princess, privately she hates to be bound to the palace and wishes to go outside. 

She often leans on the handrail and wonders: "What is the outside world like?" 

Yet she is not permitted to have much contact with the outside, which makes her very distressed. 

When her inner distress cannot be solved, she often practices dancing in the courtyard. 

As Talhae starts dancing, all the red leaves fall from her head with the wind, 

as if they are retreating for knowing they could not compete with her beauty. People who see this scene are all filled with deep emotions.

1301049.text:
The most popular maiden of Rumni, the Land of the Sunfaith, is gorgeously dressed and elegantly behaved. 

People speculate that she is the daughter of a great nobleman.

1301050.text:
She uses a long-lost magic that burns as brightly as the sun. 

People often see her as a symbol of light.

1301051.text:
She calls herself Luan, the same name as the legendary sacred bird that symbolizes the sun. 

The bird can be reborn with fire no matter what harm comes of it. 

People often regard her as the maiden guarding Rumni, the reincarnation of the sacred bird. 

However, she has not admitted this. Rather than responding to people's expectations, Luan prefers to play freely, tread lightly on the earth, walk on the wind, and dance among the clouds.

1301052.text:
She likes playing with kids and believes all of them will have a bright future where they will make a splash just like her. 

Someone who was up to no good approached Luan, 

"Since you like kids a lot, how about having a baby by yourself?" he said with an evil smile. 

But soon he paid the price for his rudeness. The maiden before him was no more the one that always wore a smile.

In a few days, a person in rags was found lying on the roadside out of the town, 

whose face was too badly battered to be recognized and whose body had suffered masses of burns and fractures. People could only tell he was still alive from his shallow breathing.

1301054.text:
From the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North, she is a young girl born in a collateral branch of the royal family, 

inheriting the royal bloodline just like Lilia. 

With outstanding magic power, she serves as a disciple of the Scarce Mage Nasha.

1301055.text:
Unlike her mentor, she retains the heart of a virtuous maiden with a lovely appearance and gentle personality. 

Clumsy as she is, Nasha will also fall into emotional fits of self-blame for making too many mistakes.

1301056.text:
But Nasha loves this disciple so much that she decided to teach Gem Magic to this weeping child. 

Only the tears of a kind-hearted maiden can condense into magic quartz and the tears are the very medium for releasing higher Gem Magic. 

After mastering the delicate Gem Magic, she remains unchanged, still a timid girl who won't take the initiative to attack others with magic.

1301057.text:
When she was a child, she had witnessed that her parents were drawn into the disputes over the royal succession and reduced to death so she was afraid of interacting with others and often made strange sounds alone. 

Her mentor Nasha used to help her learn how to fit in the society but the several attempts all ended in failure. 

Born in a collateral branch of the royal family, La Crima lived in a castle of the capital and was required to attend social gatherings. A person who has anthropophobia is apparently unable to adapt to such an environment so she sneaked out of the castle. 

Someone said she showed up on the tundra of Snegurochka and it's also said the Frost Chivalric Order is looking for her. 

Characteristically she is not willing to have too much contact with others so she may be hiding in a corner and immersed in her own world at this moment.

1301058.text:
She used to be the maid of Dana, the Goddess of Lake. 

Before Dana fell into a deep sleep, she was given the task of guarding the Forest of Elves. 

She has much respect for Dana. For thousands of years, she has been following Dana's instructions to guard the peace of the Forest of Elves.

1301059.text:
She is proficient in natural magic with no mercy for intruders who dare to disturb the forest. 

If you just enter the forest with no malicious intent, you will be spared from her fury. However, all males are forbidden to enter the forest. 

Someone witnessed that she attacked Garditis who tried to trespass on the forest and even disregarded her identity of High Elf to severely scold Garditis.

1301060.text:
Although she was not good at composing music herself, she took great care of Flora and often taught her new tunes. 

According to Mineer's proof, it seems that someone would come to the Forest of Elves regularly to pass on new songs to Mayahuel.

1301061.text:
Mayahuel liked a human male before but unexpectedly the one she revered most also liked this man, so she chose to quit and wish them happiness. 

Yet this relationship didn't last long as the human male deserted his lover and left the forest. 

Mayahuel was there to witness all so she started to hate all males and pledged that no male would be allowed to set food on Forest of Elves.

1301062.text:
A marvelous and genius alchemist who has mastered sophisticated magic at a young age. 

In pursuit of the lost ancient magic system, she entered the Chrono Tower together with Bluen.

1301063.text: Hired by Bluen, she leads a team of mercenaries to hunt for an unknown treasure in the tower.

1301064.text:
A noble chevalier who served the Protector Asherah. He swore to protect the world with his sword. 

In the disaster where magic leaked, his body changed into the shape of a frog. 

He can feel great fatigue after a short period of activity for his apparent incongruity with this body.

1301065.text:
A woman who has been guarding $heroine$ in the Chrono Tower, and provides all kinds of help.
She addresses $heroine$ as master.

1301066.text: A black cat that exudes a mysterious aura. It seems it knows a lot of secrets. $B$$B$Aloof as it is, it is always willing to help $heroine$.

1301067.text:
Born in a fading noble family, she was determined to restore her family's glory. 

She entered the Chrono Tower with her companions in the hope of finding legendary treasures and magic.

1301068.text: As an outstanding blacksmith, she dreams to find the legendary Holy Sword.

1301069.text:
The girl who entered the Chrono Tower with the preacher. She claims to be a champion of justice who repels monsters and evil forces. 

She can switch between the magic of different elements, but her personality may change as well. 

She looks cute and beautiful but once she starts talking, 

she often annoys others by making some sensational statements, especially with a superior attitude.

1301070.text:
He calls himself the servant of the merciful god, and claims that he only entered the Chrono Tower to cleanse the Heretics. 

He condemned Dejase as a heretic and tried with all his might to put an end to her research. He seems to care much about the witch's whereabouts and knowledge.

1301071.text: The Protector of Irminsul. Devoured by magic, she gradually lost her natural form.

1301072.text:
A priest who serves the Protector Asherah 

and became extremely mentally unstable after witnessing the magic abnormality.

1301073.text: The Protector of Snegurochka. Her followers call her "Her Saintess". She lives in the Glacial Castle up the mountain.

1301074.text: A gigantic white bear. As fierce as it can be, it's unbelievably gentle around Cersivey.

1301075.text:
Ereshkigal, the believer who worships the Protector of Chronospace. 

Sealed by the Protectors, she lost her spiritual support and was locked away in the Chrono Tower for countless ages.

1301088.text:
He calls himself the servant of the merciful god, and claims that he only entered the Chrono Tower to cleanse the Heretics. 

He condemned Dejase as a heretic and tried with all his might to put an end to her research. 

He seems to care much about the witch's whereabouts and knowledge.

1301103.text: It's dawn. Time to have a rest.

1301104.text: I'm Croche, uninterested in fighting, but I will do my best to assist you.

1301105.text: Even the slightest light can bring hope.

1301106.text: The unknown in the dark is so intriguing.

1301109.text: Bullying is just an act of cowardice.

1301110.text: Is weeping the only thing to do when being bullied?

1301111.text: You offered to hold my hand in the darkness. That feeling is so delightful!

I climbed up those stairs day after day in loneliness to ring the bell at the top...until one day I made a contract with the darkness.

1301117.text: I will light it up for you right away.

1301118.text: Light that comes from the darkness.

1301129.text: What's wrong? Why are you staring off into space?

1301133.text: Even the one with great talents will go off the path if their faith is lost. But don't worry, I will pray to God to bless you.

1301180.text: Mmmm...I can't do this anymore. I have reached my physical limits!

1301190.text: Hahaha... I'm feeling good as new.

1301192.text: Even God's power has limits then...

1301198.text: Oh! I can't believe that you know what I like. I appreciate that.

1301207.text: Do you need my help? No problem.

1301214.text: If not cherished, the spring will pass soon.

1301227.text: It's too dangerous. I should leave now...

1301239.text: Huh? I'm sorry. I was just thinking how my mother is as gentle as you when she speaks. What? My mother? That's a memory from a long time ago...

1301251.text: Shhh, be quiet. Instead of going to the lake, I have been here enjoying the sunshine.

1301256.text: In my mother's name, I bless you.

1301275.text: Um, I feel happy when I see your smile.

1301292.text: Are you trying to stop me?

1301295.text: I can't give up just yet...

1301326.text: You want to challenge me? Your bravery is admirable!

1301334.text: My swordsmanship is still far from perfect.

1301341.text: Your hands are so cold. Let me warm you up.

1301345.text: To think and to feel on your own is not an easy task.

1301347.text: As you command, it shall be done.

1301349.text: I'm Akasha. This is such a wonderful place... So, who are you?

1301350.text: With you by my side, I can keep fighting.

1301351.text: I've already saved the world once with my sword, and I can do it again.

1301353.text: Make a wish on a shooting star?

1301355.text: I never easily draw my sword. That's where the meaning lies.

1301363.text: The power resting in the stars...

1301365.text: This is the guidance of the sword!

1301367.text: There's still a long way to go...

1301373.text: Oh! I've never told you what I like, yet you know...

1301385.text: Are you the one that's been calling me?

1301387.text: Even during the quest, resting is necessary.

1301389.text: You know the darkness as your enemy, but I know it as a friend.

1301390.text: Did you scent it out? It's the smell of blood diffusing in the dark night.

1301397.text: Death is a kind of relief too...

1301400.text: Time to give it all back...

1301403.text: Death is also a kind of salvation.

1301408.text: I will take this with gratitude. It's quite a luxury for me.

1301412.text: I feel warmth when I'm with thee.

1301415.text: Art thou in awe of me?

1301417.text: It's okay to undertake some work.

1301422.text: Now, I can assist thee better.

1301425.text: Do not try to provoke me, for that the greatest magic always comes with horror.

1301429.text: I am the fabled Frost Witch. Art thou the one that has been calling me?

1301436.text: This world is covered by ice and snow.

1301441.text: The blood of the sword that flows in my body will ascend me to a higher place.

1301444.text: I'd rather practice my swordsmanship instead of letting my mind drift.

1301445.text: Is that a greeting to me?

1301448.text: Everyone is bound to die. So, for you, I will fight till the very end.

1301449.text: Someday, you will need to overcome yourself to find the right path. So, before that, strive to become stronger.

1301450.text: A romantic relationship that is bound to fail is even sadder.

1301453.text: Is it time to rest already?

1301454.text: The essence of my being is to fight with my sword in my hand.

1301459.text: Are you satisfied already? My swordsmanship has more to offer.

1301460.text: This is the warm-up before training.

1301464.text: I'm Octavia. I will keep training to hone more powerful skills with my sword!

1301471.text: Born for the sword, born to slay.

1301475.text: I am much more than this!

1301477.text: Is this for me? Thank you.

1301478.text: This is... For some reason I want to cry... I'm so happy.

1301481.text: I can be lost sometimes too, not knowing what to do for fun the next day...

1301483.text: What can I do about thee? Just let me guide thee!

1301484.text: Haha, thou really knowest what I like. No wonder thou art the first human I ever appreciated.

1301485.text: Do I look idle to thee?

1301488.text: Is it time to rest already?

1301489.text: It's been so long since I last saw a human being, about... five hundred years?

1301490.text: Let me handle it. Thou hast nothing to worry about.

1301492.text: I'm also tired. I could use a rest.

1301493.text: Thou art a sweet talker. I like thee.

1301495.text: I'm not as brutal as people say. I guess my kind could exist only in legends.

1301496.text: What's thy plan after our journey together?

1301501.text: I'm looking forward to all the fun.

1301505.text: Now thou can have a taste of karma!

1301510.text: Oh, the pain has lessened. I move around easier now.

1301516.text: This place is surrounded by warm air.

1301517.text: I have an indescribable feeling when I'm with you. But I don't dislike it.

1301518.text: Are you giving me new clothes? Oh, thank you. Did you handpick them?

1301520.text: Why keep staring at me? How can I help you?

1301521.text: Working hard is also a talent in some way. It's a shame that my body can't even manage that.

1301522.text: New assignment? I'll take care of it carefully.

1301524.text: Hey, do you need my strength? For you, I'll spare no effort.

1301526.text: Are you going out? Take me with you!

1301527.text: Exercising for a long time really exhausts me.

1301529.text: The power inside me? Well, I don't know for sure. Sometimes it scares me.

1301532.text: (A face with hidden secrets and a faint smile.)

1301534.text: My name? It's Tama. My mother gave it to me.

1301540.text: I've not given up just yet...

1301541.text: Hard as it is, I will not escape.

1301544.text: Thank you for helping me grow stronger.

1301545.text: As a miko, I have to keep improving my willpower.

1301546.text: I'm one step closer to the road that God laid out for me.

1301548.text: Ah, you must have sought advice from a god to find out my preferences, right?

1301549.text: Still drifting? We still have so many things to do...

1301553.text: Why do I fight the monsters? I don't have any ready answers. Maybe it's the destiny of a miko. And...with you by my side, I feel safer.

1301554.text: Curious about my job? Well, what comes first is to cleanse evil and champion justice. To be more specific, it's about getting rid of the distractions in your mind and paying all your attention to me.

1301555.text: This is a magical place, probably the so-called land of fate.

1301556.text: It must be the god who guided me to you.

1301559.text: I'll hunt the evils down to the end of the world.

1301560.text: The oracle has instructed me to follow you.

1301561.text: It's my destiny to follow you.

1301563.text: The voice in my head is the instruction of the god.

1301564.text: The voice from a previous life keeps echoing in this one.

1301565.text: The training to become a miko? I'm sorry. It's a secret that I can't tell.

1301566.text: How many rivers do I have to cross before reaching the nation where loneliness doesn't exist? With that thought, I continued my journey today. This is a song that has been passed down for generations.

1301569.text: Mikoto will follow the god's instructions. Wherever you go, I'll follow.

1301571.text: In the name of cleansing evil and championing justice...

1301575.text: The destiny of a miko is not fulfilled.

1301579.text: I'll work hard to improve my strength!

1301580.text: I've grown a bit but I can get even stronger!

1301581.text: This new power will become the foundation of my revenge.

1301583.text: Oh, I've been longing for this for so long. Thank you.

1301586.text: I'm not interested in someone so weak.

1301587.text: My father, my mother... I have been dreaming about them lately...

1301588.text: Before meeting you, revenge was likely the only thing that kept me alive...

1301589.text: I will try my best to protect you. I once lost someone important...and I don't want to see it happen again.

1301590.text: It seems that I get deceived a lot...

1301591.text: I will not break my vows.

1301592.text: Maybe I can find some information about the target.

1301593.text: I don't really need to rest.

1301594.text: To live is to seek revenge.

1301595.text: This is my path towards revenge.

1301597.text: Resting and slacking off are not the same.

1301598.text: It's already late. Get some rest.

1301614.text: My hard work has finally paid off.

1301615.text: This level of pain is far from enough...

1301616.text: I have to go through more sufferings to acquire new powers.

1301618.text: I shall never forget the joy you brought me.

1301619.text: The abyss responds to your desires, beckoning you.

1301622.text: I was lost before, but that's just an excuse for weakness. Enjoy the happiness after obtaining the power of darkness.

1301623.text: To revel in decadence or come to an end now, these are the only two choices in front of me.

1301624.text: The world sees me as the embodiment of depravity. But that's just people trying to deny the hunger buried deep inside their souls. I just want you to be different from them, to enjoy this source of happiness with me.

1301625.text: This is a great place for the ritual.

1301626.text: I'm looking for the right offering.

1301629.text: Can you also feel this supreme joy?

1301631.text: My power is strong enough to fight against humans.

1301632.text: The whole point of rest is to get ready for the next revelry...

1301634.text: Are you afraid of losing hope? Quite the contrary, desperation is the source of happiness.

1301635.text: Oh... This joy... It's so intoxicating.

1301636.text: How enviable it is to entrust your body to the darkness.

1301639.text: I serve the darkness from the abyss, that's why I don't mind being called a fiend.

1301642.text: I shall give you my soul...

1301646.text: Lament? You have not suffered enough...

1301647.text: I shall never forget this pain.

1301649.text: I can see the next card clearly now...

1301650.text: I shall make myself stronger before taking on more risks.

1302264.text: I want to meet with the legendary Arch-sorcerer and learn some real magic from her!

1302265.text: If I keep practicing, I can also master the legendary magic, right?

1302266.text: The moment I give up my training is when everything ends.

1302269.text: I'm Parme, still training. I would appreciate your guidance!

1302275.text: I'd be more careful this time...

1302279.text: My power is gradually coming back!

1302281.text: Guiding the Forest of Elves is my lofty duty.

1302282.text: I will accept what is given to me.

1302283.text: While I imagined it during my long slumber, I never thought I would actually have it.

1302284.text: Still being unrealistic? That will get you nowhere.

1302285.text: You can't decipher the action of a High Elf?

1302286.text: Mayahuel used to be my maid. But now, she has taken my place to guard the Forest of Elves.

1302287.text: I have been stuck in a long slumber. In the darkness, I could only see a monochrome, ephemeral dream.

1302288.text: That's what this is about, huh? I can sense the strong will of a qualified witch within you.

1302289.text: In the long years that I spent in my sleep, I have dreamt about waking up to a beautiful world and meeting the one I like... It seems my fantasies are turning into reality...

1302290.text: Answering the requests of elves is my duty.

1302291.text: The desire to protect is the source of all power.

1302293.text: Human, feel free to count more on me.

1302294.text: It's been almost a thousand years since I last felt a human's breath.

1302295.text: I shall grant you the protection of the god in my name.

1302296.text: Adventure in another world? That's not something I would normally do...

1302298.text: Just like me, my child has succeeded the noblest bloodline amongst elves.

1302299.text: Why have I fallen into the long sleep? I can't answer that question. Safeguarding this land is the duty of a High Elf.

1302300.text: These empty words are useless. I have seen through the vanity of this world.

1302301.text: The superior one is always lonely. Flora must have known this by heart, so she resists her destiny to become the guardian of the forest.

1302304.text: I have sensed the disturbance of magic during my long slumber. Disasters will fall on this land very soon. I shall guard this land and my people with all my might.

1302306.text: Those with no respect, prepare for god's punishment!

1302311.text: What a joke! How dare you to be the enemies of a High Elf?

1302317.text: Is this a gift for me? But my tastes are always changing.

1302318.text: You truly have made the scent of night stronger. We are really a good match.

1302319.text: If your mind drifts a little further, the night will be over!

1302320.text: You are walking by yourself this late?

1302321.text: I have anemia. Can you help me?

1302323.text: Your thirst for the Scarlet Moon will be quenched.

1302324.text: The moon is like a dazzling queen in the night sky and that's what I long to be. So can you be my night sky?

1302325.text: Oh, the people here all look delicious!

1302326.text: Ah, this is a great place for my Nocturnal Garden!

1302327.text: Oh~ It seems you need my help.

1302328.text: Ah, the sun is rising! Time for bed!

1302329.text: The scent of the night... Are you one of my kind?

1302330.text: Are we going to search for new toys?

1302331.text: I must rid myself of this bitter taste. Is there anything tasty here?

1302332.text: I feel so hungry... Oh, is this for replenishing my energy?

1302333.text: I will suck out all your feelings. Then You will have to be enchanted by me in your dizziness!

1302334.text: The untouchable things are so fascinating... Perhaps that's why humans are always after those so-called dreams.

1302335.text: A sweet scent is coming from the dark night.

1302336.text: It seems that your heart can not be easily enchanted. Haha! That's even better, because it's more fun that way.

1302339.text: Human or other creatures, all shall be my servants! Don't even try to escape. Fall for me forever! Hahaha...

1302341.text: A little kid sneaking into this dark night~~ ♪

1302342.text: The scent of the dark night~~~

1302345.text: An immortal body that belongs to the night!

1302346.text: Too weak. Isn't worth my time at all...

1302347.text: Ah, the sun is coming up! Let's retreat now!

1302349.text: Ah, don't expect too much. I hate bothersome matters!

1302350.text: All creatures can grow and I'm no exception.

1302351.text: Though I'm stronger, my work will become heavier, right?

1302353.text: Is this a reward for my hard work?

1302355.text: You are... Alive. Why are you here?

1302356.text: Don't rush me... I don't want to work just yet.

1302357.text: Am I afraid of coldness? Of course, the River of the Underworld is the dampest.

1302358.text: Oh, only if every day was free of work! That way, we could always play together.

1302359.text: This job as the Deliverer is so irritating. Would you take care of me if I quit this job?

1302360.text: This is what a workplace should be like.

1302361.text: When can I take a rest!

1302365.text: A new soul needs to be delivered?

1302366.text: If the work is not too tiring, I guess I can handle it.

1302367.text: Rest is way more important than work.

1302368.text: Pain, mourning... I have seen the final moments of all sorts of souls by the River of the Underworld.

1302369.text: Windy? Rainy? The weather in the Underworld never changes. You have to go to work on time every day.

1302370.text: I never knew I'd be so busy as a soul deliverer.

1302371.text: Are you busy as well? It seems you're exhausted.

1302374.text: I am Kyphon, serving as a Deliverer. My mission is to guide the souls from the River of the Underworld to the afterlife.

1302381.text: Oh? A new soul? Ah, never mind. I'll leave it to the others.

1302382.text: Is there no way to get out of this cycle of fate?

1302383.text: Return to the River of the Underworld...

1302384.text: The Power of Void is increasing...

1302386.text: Throughout the thousands of years, I've never been remiss...

1302387.text: Are you trying to please me?

1302388.text: It's such a rare gift. Thank you.

1302389.text: I'm going to bed now. Let's continue the work tomorrow. Good night.

1302390.text: Are you also an intruder? Don't even try to resist.

1302391.text: A lot of people covet the power of the Space of Void. This may bring dangers.

1302392.text: Are you curious about what it looks like in the Space of Void too?

1302393.text: After spending a long time in the Space of Void, I hate loneliness the most. So do my people.

1302394.text: My people and I have been staying in the Space of Void for a thousand years. Dealing with so many intruders alone has made this duty too heavy for me. If you would like to be my company, it would help a lot so I can keep guarding this land and the people who matter to me.

1302395.text: Oh, this is totally different from where I lived before.

1302396.text: I'm different from what you had expected? You thought I was a fragile girl?

1302397.text: How may I? I'm quite busy right now.

1302398.text: The intruders have all been eliminated?

1302399.text: Why can you step into the Space of Void?

1302400.text: Coffin of Voidness won't be broken that easily!

1302402.text: Take a rest when you are feeling ill.

1302403.text: Thank you for telling me what's happening outside. It's good to know what's going on out there!

1302404.text: Is guarding the Space of Void boring? I think about that question sometimes. But that's just our duty. Compared with thinking, fulfilling our duty has more priority.

1302405.text: Time to wake up! You should have a good living habit, which I have stuck to for a thousand years!

1302406.text: Don't worry about the combat. I'll protect you!

1302409.text: Anyone who attempts to cross the Coffin of Voidness into the Space of Void will be my enemy. All I know is that it's an ordained duty that has been passed down amongst our kind for centuries.

1302413.text: In the name of the Void Clan...

1302416.text: I shall equally shower every Void intruder with death.

1302417.text: The intruders are too powerful... Asking for reinforcements...

1302420.text: I have always had a hunch about this...

1302421.text: I can see it... A future where everyone is living happily...

1302423.text: Wow! It's for me! Thank you!

1302424.text: What's wrong? Why did you just stop talking?

1302425.text: Don't worry, I won't hurt you. Just come and sit.

1302426.text: Books are unbiased. That's why I enjoy reading alone in tranquility.

1302427.text: Flowing in my veins is the blood of darkness...

1302428.text: Half human, half the Night Clan. But there's no difference. After all, both sides belong to the real me.

1302429.text: That's right. I didn't even notice that we have been together all this time, but I still can't fully understand your feelings. So... can I still look forward to our future?

1302430.text: The outside world is so big!

1302431.text: As it turns out, I am still not accepted by the others, am I?

1302432.text: What do you need from me?

1302433.text: I'm glad that I can help!

1302434.text: Do you need treatment? No worries, I'll help you.

1302436.text: Are you going out? With someone like me?

1302438.text: "Descend to me, fair evening star. Glide down upon a beam, enter my dwelling and my mind, as o'er my life you gleam!" This is my favorite verse!

1302439.text: What a lovely poem... You also think so?

1302440.text: Mother? That's a topic from long ago... Yet, even after all this time, whenever I think of her, my tears would just run down...

1302441.text: Do I want to go back to human society? Well, I had that fantasy when I was young... But, that would probably stay to be a fantasy.

1302444.text: I'm Tuonel. You can consider me as a Healer... Don't worry, I'll try my best to treat you!

1302446.text: If only no one would get hurt...

1302451.text: Just as the books say, the evil will always be defeated, right?

1302452.text: You came to ask for my help but the result turns out to be...Sorry...

1302455.text: Look! Look! I look different from before?

1302460.text: Oh, you wanna play with me?

1302462.text: No one on the Fomoire Island is willing to play with me. But you are different.

1302463.text: Tomorrow you are going to play with me again? Great!

1302464.text: I'm so happy. Being with you is never boring.

1302466.text: Huh? Play with the Lord Raphan?

1302467.text: What are we going to play?

1302469.text: I am Yothaya. Wanna play with me?

1302471.text: I want to go on adventures too!

1302472.text: That was a long time, are you tired?

1302473.text: This shining stone is so beautiful. Can I have it?

1302474.text: Are you going to play in the forest? I love picking mushrooms. So much fun!

1302475.text: Did you trip? Don't worry, I'll dress the wound for you!

1302478.text: I'm about to get angry now!

1302479.text: Hush... Keep your voice down. I just sneaked out from a boring ritual.

1302481.text: Are we going to play together?

1302489.text: The sunlight is even more dazzling...

1302490.text: If I work hard, I'll earn my mother's praise.

1302491.text: That's one step closer to my dream!

1302493.text: This is for me? That's so fantastic!

1302494.text: Stop dillydallying! The sun is going down!

1302495.text: Are you also here to take a walk along the beach?

1302496.text: What a lovely song! Can you sing another one for me?

1302497.text: You don't want to get tanned? You can borrow my umbrella.

1302498.text: You can't sleep? Don't worry, I'll be here for you.

1302499.text: My dream? Well, it's to become a bride.

1302500.text: There is nothing more interesting than walking along the beach!

1302501.text: Was that a shooting star? I heard it can make any wish come true!

1302502.text: What's wrong? Is there anything you wanna ask me?

1302503.text: Rest is necessary when you are tired.

1302504.text: Who are you? Mommy said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1302505.text: How about taking a walk together?

1302506.text: You wanna ask me out? Okie, I can only stay outside for a little while so we can't go too far.

1302508.text: Mommy said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1302509.text: A shooting star flying across the sky is such a rare sight!

1302510.text: You wanna hear me sing? Well...then I have no choice but to sing one for you!

1302511.text: My mom said that one should be polite and not be a bother to others.

1302514.text: Erm...I have never been to the outside world. Mom said that there are many bad people out there... You wanna hang out with me? Really? Then we can play for a little while!

1302516.text: Mom will be worried if I don't go back home soon!

1302517.text: Listen! That's the sound of waves!

1302518.text: I'll wish upon the shooting stars!

1302520.text: My wish is not yet fulfilled!

1302521.text: Do you want to take a walk on the beach? The breeze is so comforting.

1302525.text: Should work harder when in good conditions.

1302528.text: This is amazing! I can feel my inspiration is overflowing.

1302529.text: Is your mind occupied? By a new ballade?

1302531.text: Afallen? She just wanna slack off. I'm nothing like her. I'm a bard who enjoys wandering.

1302532.text: The ballades that used to spread among the Realm are as old as time itself. My inner soul as a bard has no tolerance for that kind of stuff.

1302533.text: For generations, my ancestors have served in the Realm. So was I. But that job as a gatekeeper was so boring that I just can't waste my passion and creativity there.

1302534.text: Oh, the soul of a bard inside me! I can feel your enthusiasm and hear you calling me. Let's create more miraculous masterpieces.

1302535.text: Unlike the Realm, this place is full of exciting materials.

1302536.text: Are you giving up now? Creating something new cannot be completed simply by passion alone.

1302538.text: What do you want me to do?

1302539.text: I'm Garditis, a bard from the Realm. Will you bring me some new inspiration?

1302540.text: Do you want me to sing for you?

1302541.text: Are we out for some new materials?

1302542.text: Take a break before we move to the next spot.

1302543.text: Only a higher goal can bring out a better you.

1302544.text: I'd rather go find a new hobby than kill time here.

1302545.text: Afallen is still a child at her playful age. It's normal for her to slack off every now and then.

1302546.text: Just listen sometimes late at night when restless waves grow sad and sombre. And from the seabed out of sight, they strew the shore with bits of amber.

1302548.text: Is this all you can do?

1302549.text: Ah, the soul of a bard, please grant me strength!

1302551.text: You are merely a wrong note in the concerto.

1302555.text: No symbol of rest has turned up yet.

1302556.text: You will all become notes in my music.

1302557.text: There is no point in continuing a piece that has already been interrupted.

1302559.text: I want more targets! More targets!

1302560.text: This way, I can be recognized by the Sanctuary, right?

1302561.text: Inn: I have become more powerful! Lou: Yes! Lou feels the same!

1302563.text: Inn: Oh, Inn quite likes this.  Lou: Yes! ♪♪ Lou feels the same.

1302565.text: You seem to be in a daze. What are you thinking?

1302566.text: Are you going to read us a fairytale? Alright.

1302567.text: What's on this paper? Oh, it's an assignment given by the Sanctuary. The name of our next target is written on it.

1302568.text: Inn: Is the world outside any fun? Lou: Take us out for some fun!

1302569.text: You are not the same as the others. You are gentle to Inn and Lou. So, could we be together from now on?

1302570.text: The Ruler has new orders for us!

1302574.text: Please give us a new order! We will wipe out any targets for you.

1302575.text: A new target is added to the list?

1302576.text: We are sent by the Ruler to assist you. Please allow us to come along.

1302578.text: Inn: Are there only bad guys in the world outside?   Lou: All we know is that the names on the list belong to bad people!

1302579.text: The order can never be wrong. All targets shall be eliminated.

1302580.text: Inn: You bring us new toys?   Lou: Wow! Awesome!

1302581.text: Inn: Haven't received any new order.   Lou: Then let's go have some fun!

1302583.text: Huh? That must be a hoax...

1302584.text: Do you want to play together? But you'll have to wait for us to finish our sacred work!

1302586.text: Do we have a new target?

1302592.text: We have been spotted? Maybe next time.

1302594.text: That's a good thing to learn.

1302595.text: For you, I'll keep improving myself.

1302598.text: Your gift has pleased both the god and me.

1302600.text: I don't know you, but I like how genial you are.

1302601.text: You and the folks back home are all my people. It's my duty to help you.

1302602.text: You are different from the others. They are either afraid of me or eager to please me.

1302603.text: You want to comb my hair? You really do know what I like...

1302604.text: My heart floats gracefully with the wind, but the person whom I love is deaf to my grief.

1302605.text: This spot is giving off an eerie aura. But no need to fear, for I will not let evil spirits run free.

1302606.text: The view here is so wonderful. It inspires me to dance with all my heart.

1302607.text: For my people, I shall set off willingly.

1302608.text: My performance is not yet finished...

1302609.text: What is the outside world like? I have a keen interest in it.

1302610.text: Just follow my lead. This is also the will of the god.

1302611.text: Is this what the outside world looks like?

1302612.text: Just rest after some hard work.

1302613.text: Looking daggers beyond the heavens, I see the snow peaks of a high mountain shone by the morning sun.

1302614.text: My hometown rests on the horizon.

1302615.text: No need for regrets. Your future is still limitless.

1302616.text: 'Victory will shine upon you.' The god has answered my call.

1302619.text: My hometown rests on the horizon, thousands of miles away. I am the Princess of the Sun, the god's heir in reality.

1302621.text: I got my power from heaven and shall pass it down to humans.

1302626.text: All abominations shall vanquish at sunrise.

1302627.text: Even the beautiful cold days shall quietly slip away.

1302629.text: My shield can now protect more people!

1302631.text: I will become stronger to fulfill my mission!

1302633.text: It's my greatest honor to accept such a gift.

1302634.text: You might as well go to the training ground to improve yourself instead of wasting time here.

1302635.text: You don't look like a bad guy, but I still can't let you pass that easily.

1302636.text: The battlefield is only for those who are truly ready to fight.

1302637.text: Daily training is for better performance on the battlefield. What you have done is far from enough!

1302638.text: My power alone is insufficient. That's why I need your help.

1302639.text: It's my honor to fight with you like this. I wish one day I can go to your world and see how you live there.

1302640.text: Lack of exercise can lead to slow movements.

1302641.text: I swear by the Shield of Defending that I'll be more active in the next fight!

1302644.text: I am Avil, Guard of the Royal Capital. I swear to defend the glory of the crown of Belgica!

1302645.text: My shield hardens for the people of Belgica!

1302647.text: On the battlefield, keep monitoring yourself. No need to rush.

1302648.text: Feel free to challenge me if you think you're strong enough!

1302649.text: I'll do whatever it takes to win gloriously... If you ask me to lose either my victory or my dignity, I'll choose to lose my life.

1302650.text: To perish with honor is a worthy act.

1302651.text: A true hero, even in a crisis, never forgets the mission.

1302654.text: Avil, by order, is here to protect the capital of Belgica. All perpetrators here shall be punished by law.

1302656.text: No retreat! For the glory of Belgica!

1302661.text: The glory of the court will shine on this land again!

1302666.text: My lighter body shall help me fly higher!

1302667.text: Thank you. I'm always happy to receive gifts!

1302668.text: Oh!!! I have yearned for this for such a long time... Thanks!

1302669.text: You are seemingly deep in thought. What's going on?

1302670.text: A stranger... You are not from Rumni, are you?

1302672.text: What are you reading? A fairy tale? Let me have a look... Oh, the story of the legendary sacred bird!

1302673.text: This is an amulet made with feathers. Take it. How was this made? Oh, don't mind that. Just know that it's quite effective.

1302674.text: You enjoy freedom too? Seems like we are a good match. Well, I've decided. Let's go dancing in the clouds.

1302675.text: What a beautiful day, let's go for a picnic!

1302676.text: You look so ablush, are you having a fever?

1302677.text: Okay! Just leave it to me.

1302679.text: A world of diversity is more attractive. Humans, winds, the sun...all are full of vitality.

1302680.text: It feels so great flying in the air! Wanna give it a shot?

1302681.text: What's your destination? I can give you a ride.

1302682.text: My shoulders feel rather sore after flying for so long!

1302683.text: Are you hiding from the sun? Is it blinding? But I don't feel that at all...

1302684.text: What would the earth be like if seen from the sky? Wanna find out the answer yourself?

1302685.text: Shhh... Don't let me get caught... There's always someone in my way when I wanna go out to play.

1302686.text: Let's go enjoy the flowers in the wild! Why? Isn't spring the time to go watch the flowers?

1302688.text: You're this close to getting on my last nerve...

1302689.text: Ah, I am Luan from Rumni, right, the one that people often talk about... Yes, the flying phoenix in the air.

1302691.text: Let the fire devour your souls!

1302695.text: Death means rebirth for a phoenix.

1302696.text: My passion will light up everything.

1302697.text: For Rumni, I can't fall down... Retreat for now.

1302698.text: Burn up...until your soul turns to ashes.

1302699.text: My training is far from enough. Please guide me more!

1302700.text: To master new conjurings, I have to sharpen my willpower further than ever before.

1302701.text: My faith will carry me to the end!

1302702.text: This is for me? Well...anyway...thank you.

1302704.text: What're you gawking at? What? Counting the stars?

1302705.text: Don't move. What do you come for? Answer me now, or my spear will answer for you.

1302706.text: My trust is not easily earned. You need to prove that you are worthy of being considered as my companion.

1302707.text: Are you interested in my sister? Humph, what are you plotting? Unlike me, she will not trust you that easily.

1302708.text: Um, I'm happy to see the smile on your face.

1302709.text: If there comes one day that I can't hold the blood of the Legendary Beast within me anymore, please stop me... You are the only one I can trust on this. My spear should raise only to defend my belief.

1302710.text: Have you met Lord Flare? She is proficient in all kinds of conjuring.

1302711.text: I'm different from Miku, she is just way too kind...

1302712.text: Leave it to me. It's my duty.

1302714.text: As the heir of the bloodline of Olíndic - one of the Ovate families, I, Yui, the Demonsbane Spear, am answering your call.

1302716.text: Are you going for a new training session? Please take me with you!

1302717.text: Ah, fatigue's gone and I'm feeling better now.

1302718.text: I've been pushing myself too hard, all my muscles are so sore...ah, this feels terrible.

1302719.text: If you attempt anything risky, I will notice immediately. After all, I am also an Ovate who is monitoring this island.

1302720.text: I summon the Legendary Beast in order to enhance the nimbleness of my body. However, it will also inevitably burden my flesh with several days' worth of intense pain.

1302721.text: You feel cold? Don't worry, let's go back after the quest. There's a nice spa on the west side of the island.

1302723.text: I just... can't bear it... anymore...

1302724.text: I, the bottom-tier Ovate of Fomoire, hereby swear by my Demonsbane Spear that all invaders shall be crushed!

1302730.text: My spear... is not broken yet...

1302731.text: The Demonsbane Spear is not sharpened to slay evil but to bring peace to this world.

1302732.text: It's humiliating. A loser should just make a quick exit.

1302733.text: Fomoire will eventually enjoy its peace.

1302736.text: Ah... I saw...a different reflection in the mirror.

1302737.text: You have a gift for me? Oh, thank you.

1302738.text: This... This is my gift? Can I open it?

1302739.text: Sorry, I can hardly keep my eyes open...

1302740.text: Are you a stranger? Sorry... I...

1302741.text: Oh... we've met before... Sorry, I've been hiding from you because I'm a bit shy...

1302742.text: You...don't seem to look as scary as those intruders.

1302743.text: You also enjoy cooking? It's really fun to turn different ingredients into delicacies!

1302744.text: If gourmet dishes are what you desire, I can cook for you every day. But...if so, um...you can't try others' cooking.

1302746.text: So many strangers... I feel petrified...

1302748.text: It's so windy outside... I had better just go back to sleep.

1302749.text: Who are you? I know nothing about the outside world. I was just in my deep slumber within the mirror.

1302750.text: Eh? What do you want me to do?

1302751.text: I don't wanna go out... Can I stay here?

1302754.text: Have you met Yurugu? She's a tough kid, unlike me...

1302755.text: What new dishes are we making today?

1302756.text: The Space of Void does not welcome outsiders...

1302759.text: I'm also a resident of the Space of Void... You're not one of us, are you? If you just came here out of curiosity, can you please leave soon?

1302767.text: I should just quietly hide in a corner after such a failure...

1302769.text: This is the reward of my genuine prayer.

1302771.text: I can better follow God's guidance.

1302772.text: Is this for me? Thank you.

1302775.text: Are you also praying for God's forgiveness?

1302776.text: Everyone can feel God's mercy. What's wrong? You look so skeptical.

1302777.text: Let us thank for God's grace. Remember, stay pure in your heart.

1302778.text: You want to pray with me? You also heard the revelation of god, didn't you?

1302779.text: It must be God who guided you to me. My piety has finally impressed God...

1302781.text: Have you also felt God's mercy?

1302782.text: Is that another instruction from God?

1302784.text: Dear God, please guide your people. I, Isabel, the Executor, hereby pray for your grace.

1302786.text: All is for spreading the grace of God.

1302787.text: Thank you, God, for your grace.

1302788.text: I have never doubted God's instructions. Only those with evil intentions will.

1302790.text: All poor souls must have something to be hated for, right?

1302791.text: Aside from God's instructions, there is nothing, and no one shall disobey them.

1302794.text: Isabel, following the guidance of God, prays for all poor souls. May God forgive your sins.

1302796.text: To spread the mercy of God...

1302800.text: I can't give up just yet...

1302802.text: The evil ones... Why aren't they punished...

1302808.text: You made my day. Thank you!

1302811.text: Gems are crystal clear, so beautiful, aren't they?

1302812.text: Oh? You're quite the magic ace! A respectable sorcerer just like Ms. Nasha!

1302813.text: Oh, this place is different from my hometown, the warm spring is still here. Let's go enjoy the flowers.

1302814.text: Look, here is a magic gem, and it's for you, a token of our bond. Well... I always have an incredible sense of peace in mind when I'm with you. If you don't mind my clumsiness, can I stay by your side from now on?

1302815.text: Eh? Is the hat too big? But...it is a gift from Ms. Nasha...

1302816.text: I... I will try my best...

1302819.text: The endless tears stream down the face. Why does it always strike my heartstrings? When I'm all alone, I just can't hold back my tears.

1302821.text: Going on an adventure? That sounds dangerous...

1302823.text: Why do we keep hurting each other?

1302824.text: Ms. Nasha has taught me a lot of sophisticated magic. She is a very kind teacher!

1302825.text: Hey! I made some cookies, wanna try some?

1302829.text: I am the disciple of Ms. Nasha. I've been prone to making mistakes, but if you don't mind it, let's work together!

1302831.text: Are you trying to tease me?

1302836.text: I don't like fighting... Please leave now...

1302839.text: To be able to repel the invaders, I'll have to work harder!

1302840.text: This must be the guidance of the Goddess...

1302841.text: I've been granted a new power, and I'll fight by your side!

1302843.text: Ah, it's rare that someone knows what I like, thank you!

1302844.text: Go rest if you are tired. It's quiet here, no one will bother you.

1302845.text: You are not from this forest, are you? What are you doing here?

1302846.text: There is a fine line between kindness and wickedness.

1302847.text: It's very dangerous to get lost in the forest. Let me take you out of here.

1302848.text: My feelings about you? Well, to put it rhetorically, it's like the breeze blowing over my face.

1302849.text: Even though I will eventually leave you by the order of the Goddess, please allow me to stay by your side for now, even if it's just for a while...

1302850.text: How wonderful it is to see human children playing in the forest.

1302851.text: Spring is the gift of the Goddess to the earth.

1302852.text: Is this an instruction from the Goddess?

1302854.text: I can feel...you are longing for me intensely.

1302855.text: We feel honored under the guidance of the Goddess.

1302856.text: Please allow me to go with you.

1302857.text: Ah, it's like going back to the vibrant spring.

1302858.text: Wondering my age? Sorry, I can't tell you.

1302859.text: Exploit the forest? What a foolish question. Anyone who destroys nature will be punished.

1302860.text: I have never doubted my faith, and that is why I have stuck to my mission for thousands of years.

1302861.text: Humans seldom enter the Forest of Elves out of fear. Perhaps only innocent children may unwittingly come here to play and explore.

1302864.text: Mayahuel, by order of the Goddess, guards the Forest of Elves.

1302866.text: The violator of natural laws must be disciplined!

1302871.text: I was sent by the Goddess with the task of guarding this forest.

1302872.text: The withered trees will flourish again...

1302874.text: Guarding this forest is far more difficult than anyone could imagine.

1302875.text: I can feel the magic upsurging in my body.

1302876.text: Lord Dana... Will I be able to meet your expectations?

1302877.text: Is that for me? Ah, thanks a lot.

1302878.text: I haven't received anything to my taste in a long time. It must have been a lot of work for you to prepare this gift, right?

1302879.text: If we dawdle any longer, it will be dark outside.

1302880.text: Why are you still wandering around in the wild at such a late hour?

1302881.text: Shh... Listen, the sound of waves... That's the ocean crying.

1302882.text: You also enjoy a night as tranquil as this? Really? Maybe we are a good fit for each other.

1302883.text: I have sworn to Lord Dana just before she sank into the slumber that I will guard the Forest of Elves for her. Compared with hers, my power is far from enough. You are the only one that I can trust and rely on.

1302884.text: If there comes a day that I fall into a long sleep just like Lord Dana and will never wake up even, will you stay by my side? Ah, is that too much to ask for...

1302885.text: Viewed from above...the earth looks so vast.

1302886.text: This place, filled with the smells of humankind, is certainly different from the Forest of Elves.

1302887.text: Is this also the guidance of the night?

1302889.text: Let go of all your distracting thoughts and enjoy the night.

1302890.text: Let me open the way for you.

1302891.text: It is my duty to expel the fiends who would destroy the forest.

1302893.text: Dancing? I'm not a good dancer... but Mayahuel is.

1302894.text: The moonlight poured down on the lake, soft as silk.

1302895.text: Oh, you want to know my age? Well, you just asked an unanswerable question.

1302896.text: Up in the sky patrolling the forest, even when it rains? Of course not, my clothes would get wet.

1302899.text: I, together with Mayahuel, serve Lord Dana. It is our duty to guard this forest.

1302901.text: For the future of Forest of Elves...

1302905.text: The mission to protect is not yet completed.

1302906.text: I will try my best to protect this forest for Lord Dana.

1302907.text: Lord Dana. Sorry that I failed to fulfill the mission...

1302908.text: All are guided by the moonlight.

1302910.text: Is this also a revelation of fate?

1302911.text: I will try my best...to make everyone around me happy.

1302913.text: Oh, this is my favorite. Thank you!

1302916.text: It is the dream that grants people hope.

1302918.text: I don't really like waiting on my own. That's why I'm here.

1302919.text: This is probably our last date.... That's what's on my mind every time we meet. Every day with you means so much to me. If I'm gone one day, you will remember me, right?

1302920.text: No matter how arduous the destiny you are born with, there must be meaning to its existence.

1302921.text: As love makes people stronger, we'd... Oh, nothing. The bond of our families must be secondary.

1302924.text: It must be my destiny to meet you...

1302925.text: I'll return to reality one day, right?

1302926.text: It's hard to search for your destiny.

1302927.text: Take a break. That can calm you down.

1302928.text: Whenever or wherever we make a wish, it will surely come true as long as we strive for it hand in hand, right?

1302929.text: Hey? Are you going to lie down here? Fine, wanna lie on my laps?

1302930.text: Even if you're lost in the dark, lost on your path forward, eventually you'd wake up in the morning full of hope and strength.

1302931.text: The courage to keep marching forward is an irreplaceable treasure.

1302933.text: A slight humph to express dissatisfaction. Doesn't like to argue with others.

1302934.text: Have you ever chased after an impossible dream? I have, too. I'm just waiting, waiting for someone unknown.

1302940.text: Even if this dream is unattainable...

1302941.text: I have made up my mind to have a try.

1302942.text: All my efforts are still for nothing? But I don't wanna give up...

1302943.text: For the one I've been waiting for...

1302944.text: All the hard work will pay off.

1302945.text: I'm getting closer to my ideal chevalier figure.

1302946.text: Bandara, my spear. Show me, you master, your true power!

1302947.text: Oh, you are giving this to me?

1302948.text: Hah! How do you know my favorite... Thanks anyway.

1302949.text: How much longer are you gonna sleep?

1302950.text: Stay there, don't move, or I'll pierce you with my spear

1302951.text: You must prove yourself first, if you wish to fight by my side.

1302952.text: I'll remind you again, the battlefield is an unpredictable place and letting your guard down can mean instant death.

1302953.text: You are different from the rest in the Chivalric Order. You understand what I want, and that's why I like you.

1302954.text: In Chilora, no status is more honorable than the Warrior of the Church Chivalric Order. But I'm willing to give up all this just for you. Maybe for me, this long journey ends when I'm with you.

1302958.text: Is that already enough for you?

1302959.text: I, Fey, hereby swear on my spear to offer my service to assist you.

1302960.text: Thank you for your trust. I swear on my spear.

1302961.text: Exploration is a stage to test your strength.

1302963.text: It is an honor to die for the glory of chivalry.

1302964.text: I'll never give up my faith, even if my spear were to break.

1302965.text: The warriors in the Church Chivalric Order are all stiff-necked, they would never give up once they're determined. That includes me as well of course.

1302966.text: Feeling lonely? As a warrior, you will be alone until you're dead.

1302969.text: Fey, warrior of the Church Chivalric Order.

1302971.text: Whoever makes the first move wins.

1302976.text: Hold on to your belief until the very end.

1302985.text: The pain you can only hope for...

1302986.text: Now you know what I'm capable of!

1303062.text: Cooking, cute clothes, hot spring baths

1303063.text:
She is a young girl from the western island, Fomoire. Born in Olíndic Family, she inherits the power of the Legendary Beast. 

She is one of the Six Ovates but has the lowest status among them.

1303064.text:
She has a twin sister, younger than her, which is though not much talked about from her mouth.

Though she seldom mentions her sister, she seems to love her sister dearly. 

She is being quite protective around her sister and once someone suspicious comes near, she will lift her spear without hesitation.

1303065.text:
As an Ovate, her responsibility is to guard the Island and wipe out any intruder. 

To be as powerful as other Ovates, she followed Flare, the Priest of Irminsul to train herself. 

After the training, she not only masters the spearplay that has been passed down through generations, but also becomes proficient in all kinds of conjuring.

1303066.text:
When in combat, she stabs at the enemy with a conjuring-converged spear 

and meanwhile, summons the Legendary Beast, which can enhance the vigor of her body.

"The Demonsbane Spear is not sharpened to slay evil but to bring peace to this world."

1303071.text: Although very kind, she doesn't like to interact with others too much. $B$$B$She's not from the Sanctuary but appreciated by the Sanctuary for her powerful magic. $B$$B$That's why as an outsider, $B$she doesn't get rejected by others.

1303072.text: She called herself Sher. It's said she was forced to come here because of her difficult fate. $B$$B$Some rumors say she is an arch-sorcerer fleeing from certain sins, $B$while others say she is an elven princess from a decayed kingdom, $B$but there is no definite answer, $B$as she always keeps her distance from others, keeping her past well hidden.

1303073.text:
She has stayed in the chapel of the Sanctuary for nearly a century. $B$$B$Witnesses claim that she occasionally speaks to herself in an exotic language, $B$with no intention to be understood by others. $B$$B$She is an old acquaintance with Acheronte, who once revealed that Sher was not her real name. $B$$B$However, $B$even the haughty ruler of the River of the Underworld uses honorifics when mentioning her, $B$which shows the nobility of her origins.　$B$$B$
"If't be true the wench whom I behold up to finally receive the gift of heaven and cleanse the sins of divination, $B$mine own soul may eke grise into the final chapt'r of destiny." $B$$B$— Acheront

1303074.text: She seems to also know Akasha, Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, and Dana, Goddess of Lake, both of whom are only recorded in the legend so people speculate that Sher must have also lived for ages. According to what Kyphon said, Sher used to be the ruler of the Underworld prior to Acheronte but for some reason, she left there and became the Wanderer of Fate.

1303079.text:
A leading warrior in the Church Chivalric Order, 

who disdains worldly entanglements and dedicates everything to the martial arts.

1303080.text:
Unlike other heavy chevaliers in the order, she never wears heavy armor due to her focus on the agility and mobility. 

She always rushes into the battlefield like a gale with a magic spear in hand, and uses overwhelming strength to take out all enemies in her path.

1303081.text: By order of the Church, Fey led the members of the Chivalric Order to form an expedition into the Chrono Tower.

1303082.text:
The Order members struggled bravely against the demons, but gradually fell one by one due to fatigue, 

with only Fey holding out till the very last. 

In the face of the continuous waves of demons charging forward, Fey, calm and collected, with her spear in hand, carried out her duty till the last demon was eliminated.

1303086.text: Flower cultivation, mischief, and sprucing up.

1303087.text:
She used to be the ruler of the largest garden in Lunia. 

The plants in the garden piqued her interest more than humans.

1303088.text:
On a moonlit night, the garden was silent where only Mortimer lay alone amongst the flowers. 

Entangled by the thorns, she absorbed the essence of the roses, which could be turned into her magic.

1303089.text:
When Lunia was once again in the throes of war, Princess Eulalia traveled around to help the civilians who had suffered so greatly. 

Mortimer's unique healing magic was appreciated by Eulalia, and so she was invited to join Eulalia to save the injured that blanketed the war-torn land.

1303090.text:
Mortimer herself certainly enjoys the traveling for she has more opportunities to get close to nature and absorb the essence of flowers. 

Despite her being called the "Thorny Rose" by some, most people know this mischievous child as a helpful and gentle girl and call her "Heart of Rose". 

Together with Eulalia, she is seen as a gift from God to the land of Lunia.

1303095.text:
As the captain of the Royal Guard of Belgica, 

he is referred to as the "Iron Wall", responsible for maintaining the security of Belgica.

1303096.text:
Though loyal to the royal court of Belgica, he utterly detests the ostentatious lifestyle of those aristocrats. 

He is strict with his men and himself in discipline and bent on restoring the former glory of the royal court.

1303097.text:
He won't tolerate anyone who breaks the rule, especially those violating the law. 

Whether the troublemakers are common people or celebrated nobles, he shows no mercy and treats them equally without discrimination.

1303098.text:
He once served as the vanguard leader for the invasion of the Kingdom of Celtica, and was sent to trial for his refusal to carry out the order to burn a village. 

However, it also won him the appreciation of the royal family for his integrity. 

Avil was then transferred away from the front line to serve as the captain of the Royal Guard.

1303099.text: I want to be as strong as my sister!

1303100.text: My spear can still gather more magic.

1303101.text: Sister, I'm better now than before, right?

1303102.text: Is this for me? But I haven't done anything to deserve this...

1303107.text: Oh, I'm not familiar with things around here. It would be great if you can help me. Where are you taking me next? I'm looking forward to it.

1303108.text: Oh, you seem to have caught a cold. Don't worry, I have medicine. I'll make you some porridge later. Hey, don't just stand there, lie down and get some rest.

1303109.text: You have chosen me over my sister? I'm so happy... Oh sorry... my tears just... I have been always taking my sister as a role model and wishing to be like her... So I just can't believe you've chosen me... (Sobs) Thank you...

1303110.text: Controlling magic is a very difficult skill to master.

1303111.text: I am still in training so I can't use conjuring very well.

1303112.text: Is this a new training exercise?

1303113.text: Thank you, I've learned a lot.

1303114.text: Unlike my talented sister, I still need to work hard. Please guide me!

1303115.text: For Fomoire, Miku will work and train harder.

1303116.text: Going for an adventure? May I join you?

1303118.text: My spear carries and delivers the will of its master.

1303119.text: It must be very hard to work as an Ovate. I will train harder to become a capable assistant for my sister!

1303120.text: Legendary Beasts wielding incredible power are also part of our family but they are not easy to control.

1303121.text: What a cute hairpin, is this for me? Thank you! I always ask my sister where I can buy one, but she never tells me.

1303124.text: Miku wants to be as independent as my sister!

1303126.text: Starting a battle will be the last resort...

1303131.text: I can safeguard Fomoire just like my sister.

1303132.text: Still... I'm not on my sister's level...

1303134.text: The aroma of roses is getting stronger.

1303135.text: I'm still pretty weak and fragile, don't you think?

1303136.text: The rose striving to bloom awaits the nourishment of love.

1303138.text: You really know what I like. You haven't given gifts like this to others, have you?

1303139.text: Are you lost? Why do you keep circling around?

1303140.text: This is my garden. Strangers are not allowed here.

1303141.text: The forest is quite dangerous at night. Don't get lost.

1303142.text: Just like these budding flowers, I'm also lacking the nourishment of love.

1303143.text: You can't fall asleep? What can I do about you! Come! Lie down here and talk to me. This spot is surrounded by roses with thorns, so don't even try to tell lies.

1303144.text:
This is a ring made from rose stems. Don't worry, I've removed the thorns. Try it on! I'm sure it's a perfect fit. ♪♪
Why do I give this to you? Well, no particular reason. I just need to put something on you to ward off any pests that might be in the way.

1303146.text: You wanna be spoiled, don't you?

1303148.text: Is it already bedtime? It's still early!

1303149.text: Walking by yourself at night could be very dangerous. Mortimer has sensed you.

1303150.text: Don't worry, I'll be there soon.

1303151.text: The aroma of wild flowers, I've waited so long for this.

1303152.text: The spring rains have rejuvenated the flowers.

1303153.text: I'm not used to showing up like this. Do you wanna see my true form?

1303154.text: A flower wilts without the nourishment of love. I yearn for love and care more than anyone.

1303155.text: Do not try to pick this thorny rose. Only if you are prepared to be pricked may you indulge in its fragrance.

1303156.text: It's dangerous to get lost at night. I know the way out of the forest, but am I going to tell you about it?

1303159.text: Can you feel the rose's heart too? We really resonate at the same level. Mortimer wants to stay by your side...

1303166.text: This is the end already? I haven't had enough fun yet.

1303167.text: Will the dew of love never nourish the flowers that have been waiting in desperate solitude?

1303169.text: It is also a part of the Lord's guidance.

1303170.text: This power will bring forth the future!

1303171.text: My Lord, the Banner of Glory basks in your holy grace.

1303173.text: Is my taste strange? You are giving this to me after careful selection, right?

1303174.text: The Lord will not bless you if you remain stagnant.

1303175.text: You, stranger. You are not a spy, right? No need to be afraid, tell me your name.

1303176.text: There's nothing to be afraid of if you can also hold on to your own beliefs.

1303177.text: It's been forever since I felt this peaceful just passing the time. Maybe it's because I feel at ease when I see you.

1303178.text:
You don't need to console me. Nope, there's no need.
But for this one time, I do feel grateful.

1303179.text:
We can't breathe our last breath until we have eliminated all the enemies of the country.
Let's return here after the war...
Huh? I'm not worried about you.
Hold my hand and swear to me here.

1303180.text: This place just reminds me of my hometown.

1303182.text: I swear in the name of my Lord. I will not fail you.

1303184.text: The glory of the Lord is given only to the bravest of warriors.

1303185.text: My Lord, may your holy grace bless my compatriots.

1303187.text: It also counts for a warrior to rest well before a battle.

1303188.text: It is better to keep your faith than to keep your life, even at the expense of dying young.

1303189.text: The Lord will only bless those dauntless.

1303190.text: I'm the only one who can save this country.

1303191.text: You only live once, so I choose to follow the Lord's guidance and dedicate my life to the liberation of my country.

1303194.text: Saving the country is my task given by my Lord, and I have no fear as I was born for this duty.

1303196.text: To die unflinchingly for the glory of the country!

1303201.text: All invaders shall be expelled from our homeland, or dead.

1303202.text: For the sake of my country, I can't give up yet...

1303203.text: This is the end of you!

1303207.text: Looks like we've got another prayer in the dark.

1303208.text: Trying to take advantage of me?

1303209.text: You look groggy. Are you okay?

1303216.text: Please take your hands off me...

1303223.text: What's the matter? You've never seen this kind of clothes before?
