1303241.text: I don't quite understand...but I feel at complete peace when I'm with you.

1303243.text: It feels kind of nice. You can stroke a little more if you want.

1303245.text: Whoa! Ahem... I just pretended to be scared by you.

1303246.text: Why did you suddenly come over and stroke me? Is this a new way of greeting?

1303252.text: It seems that you harbor some evil thoughts...

1303253.text: You can't touch wherever you want!

1303254.text: You want me to stroke you as well? Good girl...

1303255.text: Ohh!... Ahem, Please don't scare me.

1303256.text: I won't feel lonely...as long as you are by my side.

1303257.text: It's of no use to blame you.

1303259.text: Don't touch me. Doesn't thou feel cold?

1303260.text: Wh...what did thou do to me!? Thou...thou shouldest be ashamed!

1303262.text: Hast thou got no sense of shame?

1303263.text: It's okay to take a short break.

1303264.text: Are you stroking my head? It feels more interesting than I imagined.

1303268.text: Please stop. My sword is still in hand.

1303272.text: I'm very forgiving. Just get down on thy knees and apologize!

1303273.text: Do not stare at my tail, there's no point in doing so.

1303274.text: I guess being caressed by you is not that bad.

1303275.text: Ah not in this way...I don't like it...

1303276.text: I haven't felt this kind of warmth for a long time...

1303277.text: You want to piss me off? I'll probably just ignore you instead.

1303279.text: May God bless you as well.

1303280.text: Unclean souls need to be purified.

1303281.text: Is there something on my face?

1303282.text: Please dispel the evil out that body, my Lord!

1303283.text: My dress? It's a miko's daily wear.

1303284.text: Am I too short? I...I'm not that concerned about my height... Really!

1303285.text: My sword can stifle any wicked thought.

1303287.text: Why did you do this out of the blue?

1303288.text: Are you curious about my dress?

1303290.text: Do you want to sacrifice yourself to me?

1303292.text: It seems that we've found the offering for the next ritual...

1303295.text: Ah... My Lord, forgive me, for I will have to teach this insolent fool some manners!

1303296.text: Stop it now! This is unseemly behavior.

1303297.text: What are you doing! The Lord will not forgive you for your sins!

1303298.text: Stand up. If you're gonna walk the same path, don't ever kneel again.

1303299.text: Does losing all money get you carried away?

1303300.text: You resort to this simply because you can't win against me?

1303301.text: I'm gonna make you regret your poor behavior.

1303303.text: What's wrong? Are you doubting yourself?

1303333.text: Shoo shoo! I'm going to play in the garden.

1303345.text: Do you wanna know everything about me?

1303346.text: Is that how you show your loyalty?

1303347.text: There is no taboo between us. Nothing to conceal.

Living on the shore of Elf Lakeside, 

she often spends her nights quietly bathing in the moonlight by the Lake and praying to Dana, Goddess of Lake who guarded Elf Lake before.

1303665.text:
Dana, who slumbers in the depths of the Elf Lake, sensed her devotion. The Goddess conjured the moonlight on the lake into the form of a dolphin and then bestowed on her the dolphin along with the ability to manipulate the moonlight. 

In the moonlight, Mineer could feel the connection with the Goddess of Lake. 

While the Goddess slumbers, she maintains the peace of the Forest of Elves with her companions, quietly waiting for the goddess to awaken.

1303666.text:
She often plays with Flora by the lake and meanwhile shoulders the responsibility of keeping Flora safe. 

Anyone who attempts to approach Flora with ill intentions will be sanctioned by her powerful magic.

1303667.text:
`Both she and Mayahuel know Dana's romance story with the human male 

but Mineer seems to know the real reason why the human male finally left Dana. 

Thus she privately still keeps in touch with that man who delivers the latest news of the outside to her, including some news songs. 

Mayahuel knows nothing about this and even asks Mineer to teach the songs to Flora. 

Mineer's elegant manners often lead to an illusion that she has good taste in music but actually she is a bad learner of music. 

Each time she performs the new song before Mayahuel, she makes a slip-up and stammers in defence, with a modest face entirely different from usual. 

Luckily Mayahuel is not very suspicious but just curious why Mineer can discover such a great piece of music.

She is into cooking but it really bothers her that she can't find anyone to taste her cuisines. $B$$B$Compared with directly talking to others, $B$she prefers to sneak a peek first and when she confirms the one is harmless, she will show up.$B$$B$
"Who are you? I know nothing about the outside world. $B$I was just in my deep slumber within the mirror."

1304368.text: She is a sorcerer born in the Kingdom of Lochaber. $B$She can absorb the magic power from the stars $B$and use it to heal the sick.

1304369.text: Self-assured for her beauty, $B$she takes others' admiration for granted $B$and quite enjoys the feeling of being flattered.

1304370.text: To maintain the constant stream of magic, $B$she often climbs to the mountain top at night to collect the magic power of the stars, $B$$B$which is said to be the key to her beauty. $B$Some copied everything she does $B$but all drew a blank.

1304371.text: She hates being touched by others. $B$She personally explained that the star power is attached to her skin $B$so anyone who touches her skin will take away her magic, which leads to her skin aging. $B$$B$But for a maiden of her age, the skin seems unlikely to age.

1304373.text: She is the captain of the Royal Guard of Lochaber, $B$showing great loyalty to the royal court. $B$Anyone that tends to threaten the royal court shall be executed by her.

1304374.text: Maiden as she is, $B$her orders are followed by all royal soldiers. $B$Even the general doesn't dare to take her suggestions lightly. $B$$B$She worships the force so she would rather use the double swords in her hands to subdue the opposite side than talk a lot to convince others. $B$$B$She believes guarding Lochaber is the supreme glory even if it may cost her life.

1304375.text: It turns out that she is the princess of Lochaber who possesses the right of succession $B$but she gave up the cozy life $B$and chose to guard the royal court with her own hands, $B$which won her the admiration from the soldiers who identified her orders with the royal court's.

1304376.text: With a royal background, she sometimes can be arrogant. $B$$B$Once on a quest, she wielded her swords only to prove her prowess, which led her to fall into the enemies' trap. $B$Finally, she got rescued by her best companion and friend who yet was deprived of life for this. $B$$B$This was a hard hit to Hilda and she started to reflect on her reckless behaviors. $B$To pass on her friend's will, she carries her friend's sword on the waist and swears that her swords will only be drawn for protecting people.

1304584.text: The sun is so blinding... Is this umbrella too small?

1304585.text: Do I look cute in my swimsuit? Whoo-hoo!

1304586.text: Everything here exudes breaths of life, even the pain in my body has been relieved.

1304587.text: I'm not used to dressing like this... However, it's a rare trip to the beach, want to swim together? Let's create some good memories this summer.

1304589.text: Stop... I don't have much confidence in my body shape.

1304590.text: Please don't... Whatever you do, I won't smile...

1304591.text: What do you want? I hate this...

1304592.text: My legs are getting thicker... I knew it would happen since I haven't been out recently.

1304593.text: Let's go collect seashells together, shall we?

1304594.text: I envy the other kids. My body...can't even manage the basics...

1304595.text: Don't expect too much from me...

1304596.text: My legs feel so heavy... Can we rest now?

1304597.text: Do you need my help? I'm not very confident, but I'll give it a try...

1304598.text: I'll try my best to meet your expectations...

1304599.text: Can we not go too far?

1304600.text: Rest if you're tired, don't push yourself too hard.

1304601.text: This ring of buoyance? I'm not confident in my physical strength, so I've brought this, just in case.

1304602.text: One day, I will also be devoured by the magic in my body...

1304603.text: My past? Sorry, I don't really want to talk about it... Only painful memories remain now.

1304604.text: There may be a glimmer of hope in my future...

1304607.text: Thank you for coming to the beach with me. I haven't been out for such a long time.

1304609.text: Why do we have to hurt each other...

1304614.text: I'm not used to it yet, but I can fight...

1304615.text: Sorry, I'm still not used to direct sunlight...

1304619.text: Exploration can be very hard. You should have a good rest.

1304620.text: The blessing of Lunia will shine up your soul.

1304621.text: Let me offer you a dance to soothe you.

1304622.text: Have some sleep if you're tired, don't push yourself too hard.

1304623.text: Let the aroma of flowers ease you.

1304624.text: Welcome back. Let me play a song for you.

1304625.text: Tired? Take a nap on the back of this kid.

1304626.text: You're back. Well... Not that over-happy about your return.

1304627.text: Rest if you're tired. Get pumped up for the next battle.

1304628.text: A break between quests can be very important.

1304629.text: Finally, you're back. Waiting for you? No, I never wait for you!

1304630.text: You're back. Want to go to the training ground to practice with me?

1304631.text: Welcome back. Wanna play with me?

1304632.text: Exercising for a long time really exhausts human.

1304633.text: Welcome back. It's my destiny to follow you.

1304635.text: I'm ready for the next party.

1304636.text: The Lord asked me to wait here for your return and embark on the same path with you.

1304637.text: Are you going to rest? Play one more round with me before then.

1304638.text: I've been waiting for you. I've found a new villain.

1304639.text: You're back. Fighting by your side is my honor!

1304641.text: The wind tells me you're back.

1304642.text: Come over here and have a drink with me.

1304643.text: Welcome back! Let's go make dessert!

1304644.text: Let's take a short break and go hunting together.

1304645.text: It's Cynetia. I hear your voice. Hoo hoo!

1304646.text: You're finally back. I've be waiting for you long.

1304648.text: Thirst for more chaos from me!

1304649.text: Don't push yourself. You look tired.

1304650.text: I've been waiting for you for a long time. Aha.

1304651.text: I haven't cleaned up here for a long time, for I'm just waiting for you to come back.

1304652.text: What an arrogant guy to make me wait here.

1304653.text: All the long time passed, lies in my hands.

1304654.text: Get some rest. A new adventure is about to begin.

1304655.text: You've been working hard. You should get some rest.

1304656.text: Welcome back. I shall grant you the blessing of the elves.

1304657.text: Hungry. Let's go get something to eat.

1304658.text: I've been waiting so long that even I'm tired.

1304659.text: Welcome back. Don't worry. I'm used to waiting.

1304660.text: Muscle aches? Do you want me to massage you?

1304661.text: Have a good rest now, for we're going out to play later.

1304662.text: Get some rest if you're tired. I'll take care of you.

1304663.text: Welcome back. Do you have new creative materials for me?

1304664.text: It's so boring to stay here all the time. Let's go out and play!

1304665.text: I also want to see the outside world. Can you bring me along on your next adventure?

1304666.text: Don't worry, I'll take care of the guard here.

1304667.text: Your shoulders are stiff. Let me give you a massage.

1304668.text: Muscle aches? Don't worry, let's go to the spa!

1304669.text: Nanel is used to staying here alone. Don't worry about me please.

1304670.text: My piety has touched God. It blesses your safe return.

1304671.text: Welcome back. I feel warm every time I see you.

1304672.text: It will be lonely to stay here alone.

1304673.text: Welcome back. Do you bring me new research material?

1304674.text: Thank you, Goddess, for your safe return.

1304675.text: If you don't come back, I might fall into a deep sleep like Lord Dana.

1304676.text: Go rest if you're tired. I'll be on guard here.

1304677.text: I'm used to waiting, so you don't have to worry about me.

1304678.text: I've been waiting for you. Come and give me a massage on my shoulders!

1304679.text: It would be wise to leave this to me, and I will always be on guard in your absence.

1304680.text: Welcome back. Please take me along on your next adventure.

1304681.text: Moltimer has been waiting for you for a long time, welcome back.

1304749.text: Inn and Lou are twin sisters. Although born in the Sanctuary, they are regarded as defective by the ruler of the Sanctuary because of their lack of magic. Naturally, they were treated coldly by other people there. These two sisters endured the pain they should not have suffered at their age.

1304750.text: The twins, who were struggling to survive in the corners of the Sanctuary, have finally ushered in a turning point in their lives. As the monsters invaded and the conflicts between the Upper and Lower Domain intensified, the Protector decided to let them work for her. She gave the twins the lowest work in the Sanctuary. The so-called work is actually some dishonorable work. Although they are slightly less magically powerful than others, they are obviously more than enough to deal with these lower-class civilians or lower-level monsters.

1304751.text: As if a ray of sunlight shot into the darkness, Inn and Lou came out of the shadows and became residents of Sanctuary, where they could serve the Protector. They have no thoughts of their own, but simply mechanically carry out the orders from the Protector, constantly eliminating the targets on the list, and then moving on to the next.

1304752.text: The sisters' petite figures are their best cover when they are on a quest. No one would have guessed that the seemingly innocent twins are the most cold-blooded of assassins. The two of them have an amazing destructive power that does not match their appearance at all. When together, Inn and Lou never fail any assassination. Now, the Protector sends them to the Lower Domain, to prepare to wipe out the next target on the quest list, the leader of the Alliance of the Rebellions.

1304768.text: Captain of the Frost Chivalric Order

1304778.text:
The soothsayer who appeared in the village according to the Witch's recollection. 
Irminsul is her hometown, and what appears in Chilora seems to be only her phantom. It is not clear who projected her phantom into Chilora. There seems to be a deep secret lurking behind it.

1304779.text: A human before. He became a caterpillar due to the magical mutation in Irminsul, and was very worried about his brother who went to find out the cause of the mutation.

1304780.text: A human before. Tried to explore the cause of the magical mutation in Irminsul, but also became a magical creature after failure.

1304781.text: An orphan who grew up in a convent. She is often bullied by others and is responsible for ringing the bell on the roof of the clock tower late at night.

1304782.text: A merchant from the Irene Island. He took the form of a Treant due to a magical mutation. Caught in the grief of losing his wife and son, he has pined away. He hopes to return to his hometown with the treasures that he once buried.

1304783.text: She used to be a sought-after singer. She became a sunflower after a magical mutation and is extremely mentally unstable, seemingly with an abnormal obsession with being sought after.

1304784.text:
One of the Six Ovates who once practiced with Flare, the priest of Irminsul. 
After discovering that Irminsul's catastrophe might affect Fomoire, chose to return to hometown and deal with the catastrophe with other Ovates.

1304785.text:
One of the Six Ovates of Fomoire who often sneaked into Irminsul to play. 
Sensing the catastrophe in Irminsul, she quickly returned to Fomoire to report to Norn.

1304786.text: The head of the Six Ovates of Fomoire. After learning of the catastrophe in Irminsul, decided to go to Irminsul to find out the cause of it.

1304787.text: A magician who can take in the magic of starlight to maintain her beauty. Hearing that inside the Chrono Tower exists a magical potion for eternal youth, she decided to enter the tower to find it.

1304788.text: The leader of the hunters of the village at the mountain foot, leading the village to survive in the bitter cold.

1304789.text: The leader of the hillside hunters. In order to compete for hunting territory, they often quarrel with Silverbow's men and even attacked them.

1304790.text: The leader of the pack, whose original habitat was occupied by Hervoraltar, had to lead the pack to the hillside. Often clashes with humans.

1304791.text: The mount of Cersivey, the Protector. It is so ferocious that it can easily tear up enemies with its claws.

1304792.text: The head of the Frost Chivalric Order loyal to the Protector Cersivey. He is ordered to guard the gate of the Glacial Castle, forbidding anyone to enter.

1304793.text: A little wolf which was injured in the trap. Got rescued by the Witch and brought back to its mother.

1304794.text: A girl curled up in the corner of the cave, with all her body already frozen. She was found and saved by the protagonist.

1304795.text:
An eccentric Sorcerer. Her mind can be as unpredictable as a child's and she often throws tantrums. 
Lilia is her friend, and they often play together.

1304796.text: Princess of the Principality of Holmgard, who yearns for the outside world and often sneaks out of the castle. She has a good relationship with Pakane.

1304797.text: A former Deliverer, who, however, broke the oath and signed a contract with demons, and now reaps souls of the living.

1304798.text: Very afraid to talk with others, and often makes a variety of strange noises. Unwilling to have too much contact with the outside world.

1304799.text: The daughter of Silverbow, who has absolute confidence in her archery skills.

1304800.text: The vice captain of the Frost Chivalric Order was sent by the Protector Cersivey on a special quest. She seems to have encountered some accident. No one has seen her since then.

1304801.text:
She used to be a subordinate of Ereshkigal. After Ereshkigal was sealed, she has been looking for opportunities to avenge her master. 
After discovering the Geothermy, she decided to use it to destroy Snegurochka, ruled by Cersivey.
